title: Minecraft现已登陆Oculus
author: obby825
txt_content:
本帖最后由 bobby825 于 2015-9-25 16:53 编辑

Oculus: We're thrilled to announce Minecraft for the #Rift! Tune in to the #OC2 keynotes: http://ocul.us/twitch
Oculus: 我们非常激动地宣布Minecraft现已登陆Rift！直播：http://ocul.us/twitch

Kappische: haha! :D MC on oculus just announced!
Kappische: Now that is an excited guy! I hope you'll be as excited too when playing Minecraft on the oculus! <3
Kappische: 哈哈！:D Minecraft在Oculus上的版本现已发布！
Kappische: 现在我很激动！我期望你们能在Oculus上玩Minecraft时同样激动。<3

Tommc: Minecraft on the Oculus is happening! We actually had a demo for a year or so, glad it’s becoming a full edition :D 
Tommc: Minecraft在Oculus上的版本现已发布！我们在一年前做过一个demo，现在这是完整版了 :D

Notch的评论
Notch: My opinion on minecraft/oculus? Neato! Now, back to ignoring Quiet because D.D. obviously is much better.
Notch: 我对于minecraft/oculus的想法？棒棒哒！



注：
Oculus是一款VR设备，详见http://www.oculus.com/（图片来自官网）
